Hamilton jobsFEST Thursday September 25, 2003 10:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Hamilton Convention Centre 1 Summers Lane - Wentworth Room Hamilton jobsFEST is a comprehensive employment fair, providing employers and job seekers with the opportunity to meet face-to-face to discuss employment opportunities. Employers are able to recruit and interview on-site. Job seekers can take advantage of resume writing workshops, Job Search Central, as well as the opportunity to be interviewed by employers on site.
This trade show style event provides access to the "hidden job market". Since the inception of The jobsMARKET events in 1997, over 100,000 job seekers and over 1,000 businesses have attended these events in Southern Ontario and greater Toronto with 33% of job seekers securing employment within twelve weeks of each event.
